about.title: About LCDC IT & Dev
about.description:
Solving virtual problems for a real world.

I'm Cristian Muriel, web developer and IT support. I work with web systems and technological support oriented to concrete needs, for people, entrepreneurs and businesses.
about.card_description:
LCDC IT & Dev is the continuity of my professional experience, with a clear commitment in each project.

Seriousness and responsibility in every challenge.

services.title: Available Services
services.description: Flexible solutions for all types of clients: entrepreneurs, SMEs and advanced projects

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Complete sites and web solutions adapted to each need: from landing pages to systems with administrative panels, multilanguage support and continuous maintenance.

items.title: Custom Web Systems
items.description: Development of web systems designed to manage real processes: users, data, workflows and information control. Ideal when a common website is not enough.

items.title: Remote Technical Support
items.description: Remote assistance to solve technical problems, optimize equipment and keep them running correctly.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Some work that shows what I can do

items.title: Omnia Uno ‚Äî Modular Web System
items.description: Web system to organize daily work for businesses and entrepreneurs. Allows managing jobs, clients, users, appointments and much more from one place.

items.title: BA Meat & Grill
items.description: Bilingual website for Argentine gastronomic experiences, with integrated reservations and multilanguage content.

items.title: FM 98.7 ‚Äî Online Radio
items.description: Website for local radio with live streaming and content management. Includes online streaming, Auto-DJ, news section and administration panel adapted for daily publishing.

items.title: Cookie Slayer ‚Äî 2D Web Game (Experiment)
items.description: 2D game experiment developed in vanilla JavaScript, with sprite animation, collisions, parallax and controls adapted for keyboard and touch screen.

items.title: Maze Scape ‚Äî Maze Game (Experiment)
items.description: Top-down game experiment developed in JavaScript, with procedural generation, basic state-based AI and combined keyboard and mouse controls.

cta.title: Did you like what you saw?
cta.description: These are some examples of what I can do. Each project adapts to the client's specific need.
